topic.title: Dynamic Tables
topic.shortdesc: Documentation and examples for creating dynamic tables with the Bootstrap Tables extension.

body.p: The DITA Bootstrap Tables is a DITA-OT plug-in that incorporates the Bootstrap Table library and adds the necessary CSS and JavaScript for dynamic tables with search, sort and pagination functions

section.title: Installing the DITA Bootstrap Tables plug-in
section.p: Use the dita command to add the DITA Bootstrap Extension plug-in to your DITA Open Toolkit installation:

section.title: Search and Filtering
section.p: Add table otherprops="search" to filter the results based on a search term.

fig.title: Example table with the results filtering on "Bear"

section.title: Pagination
section.p: Add table otherprops="pagination" to add paginator to a large table.

fig.title: Paginated table with 140 rows reduced to ten

section.title: Sorting
section.p: Add table otherprops="sortable" to allow each column to be sorted dynamically.

fig.title: Sorted table using reverse alphabetical order
